title: [vault] 怎么获取玩家的货币数量
author: Ray_Hughes
txt_content:
主要是高版本改了写法 我也是服了
double getBalance(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player,
                String world)
Gets balance of a player on the specified world. IMPLEMENTATION SPECIFIC - if an economy plugin does not support this the global balance will be returned.
Parameters:
player - to check
world - name of the world
Returns:
Amount currently held in players account复制代码这怎么调用啊 
OfflinePlayer
我吐了 救救我

replies.author: 白灯
replies.txt_content: Player 继承的 OfflinePlayer，用 Player 也可以。

replies.author: Ray_Hughes
replies.txt_content:
疾风暗影 发表于 2020-5-1 10:01
又是大佬你诶 解决了 谢谢!
